name: Messenger: City of Messages
description:
You are thrown into a city of people and you must help the townspeople by delivering messages for them.  You must deliver all 10 messages to win. 

Talk to people and they will give you messages to give to other people.

Over 25 people to talk to.

Remember to face the person you are trying to talk to.

This game does require the ncurses library.

Controls:

WASD: Move

Space: Talk to People

Q: Exit
